announcements.details: There will be ONE mass on Sunday, 9th February, 2025. Offertory will be led by all Day Groups. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Children Service.

announcements.details: Bible studies continues today at 4pm at the church. Kindly come along with a friend

announcements.details: There will be a revival from 5th-7th February 2025 at 7pm each night right here at the church

announcements.details: The St. Bakhita youth has something special for this year's Valentine's Day on Friday, 14th February, 2025. It will be a day of engaging interactions on love with reasoned guests aside other love-fun activities.
announcements.title: Valentine's Day

announcements.details: Life in the Spirit Seminar starts on Sunday 16th February, 2025. Registration is still ongoing at the church.
announcements.title: Life in the Spirit Seminar

announcements.details: The St Bakhita Marriage School will reopen on 9th February, 2025. Prospective counselees who wish to have their marriages solemnized in 2025 should please pick up registration forms from the office of the Rector.
announcements.title: St Bakhita Marriage School
